response_parsed.title: Type-Checking Microservices Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide explains how to implement type checking in your microservices using FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.
key_points: FastAPI supports automatic schema generation and type checking out of the box
FastAPI uses Pydantic models for data validation and serialization
You can also create custom BaseModel subclasses to further customize your data validation and serialization needs
FastAPI offers robust error handling, making it easier to handle client errors and validate incoming requests
version_notes: FastAPI v0.73 and above supports Python 3.12
Python 3.12 brings several improvements in performance and memory usage
caveats: Ensure that you have the required dependencies (such as FastAPI, Uvicorn) installed before running your code
FastAPI's type checking may not be compatible with certain legacy Python 3.x libraries or frameworks
